titles.title: Manga Nippon Mukashibanashi: Horafuki Tengu/Okesa Neko
Japanese Folklore Tales Movie
まんが日本昔ばなし ほらふき天狗・おけさねこ
Παλιά Γιαπωνέζικα Παραμύθια

anime.description: Note: Episode from http://anidb.net/a3588 [Manga Nippon Mukashibanashi]. Shown in the Toei Manga Matsuri film festival together with http://anidb.net/a2270 [Aladdin to Mahou no Lamp], http://anidb.net/a1926 [Asari-chan]`s 53rd episode (愛のメルヘン少女) and some tokusatsu features.
